subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Klaus Kröll gave Austria its first World Cup downhill victory of the season, edging Bode Miller by 0.01 of a second in a race so tight the top five skiers were separated by only 0.08 of a second.
snippet: Klaus Kröll gave Austria its first World Cup downhill victory of the season, edging Bode Miller by 0.01 of a second in a race so tight the top five skiers were separated by only 0.08 of a second.
